ranked_diseases.explanation: Perfect match with all patient phenotypes (chronic kidney disease, gout, renal cyst, renal interstitial fibrosis). Two reference cases with identical presentation were diagnosed with this condition.
Matches all patient phenotypes. Reference case 1 had identical features plus Stage 5 CKD. The patient may have an earlier stage of this condition.
Part of the ADTKD spectrum that includes renal cysts, chronic kidney disease, and gout. Not seen in reference cases but phenotypically consistent.
Another ADTKD subtype that can present with similar features including CKD and renal cysts, though gout is less common in this form.
Recently described ADTKD subtype that can present with CKD and tubulointerstitial fibrosis, though renal cysts and gout are less typical.
Historic name for ADTKD2, presents with renal cysts, chronic kidney disease, and can have hyperuricemia/gout.
Alternative name for ADTKD1, characterized by early-onset gout, chronic kidney disease, and tubulointerstitial nephritis.
